author: cnbc.com
title: ProPetro Schedules Full Year and Fourth Quarter 2017 Earnings Release Date and Conference Call
text:
MIDLAND, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- ProPetro Holding Corp. (“ProPetro”) (NYSE: PUMP) today announced that it will issue its full year and fourth quarter 2017 earnings release on Monday, March 26, 2018 after the close of trading. ProPetro will host a conference call on Tuesday, March 27, 2018 at 8:00 AM Central Time to discuss fourth quarter results and recent developments.
To access the conference call, U.S. callers may dial toll free 1-877-317-6799 and international callers may dial 1-412-317-6799. Please call ten minutes ahead of the scheduled start time to ensure a proper connection. The call will also be webcast on ProPetro’s web site, www.propetroservices.com .
A replay of the conference call will be available for one week following the call and can be accessed by dialing 1-877-344-7529 for U.S. callers and 1-412-317-0088 for international callers. The access code for the replay is 10116656.
About ProPetro
ProPetro Holding Corp. is a Midland, Texas-based oilfield services company providing pressure pumping and other complementary services to leading upstream oil and gas companies engaged in the exploration and production of North American unconventional oil and natural gas resources.
